text: (E tore) fun awon alaini ti won se (ara won monu mosalasi Anabi nitori ki won le maa jagun) fun aabo esin Allahu. Won ko si lagbara lilo-bibo lori ile (fun okowo sise). Eni ti ko mo won maa ka won kun oloro latara aisagbe. O maa mo won pelu ami won. Won ko nii toro nnkan lowo eniyan lemolemo. Ohunkohun ti e ba na ni ohun rere, dajudaju Allahu ni Onimo nipa re
